data.description:
A virtual home filled with endless experiences to discover and explore, a place to connect with loved ones. Casual games, world travel, media customization, relaxation, and adventure.

- Invite your friends and family, and play games, share photos, upload and watch your own videos - standard, and 360, and step into them together
- Travel to new places together and see the world: take a city tour, a hot air balloon ride, or a back-country road trip
- Explore the depth of the ocean - go diving in the Great Barrier Reef of Australia, or swim with dolphins in the Pacific Ocean
- Relax on a beach practicing guided meditation
- Listen to classical music
- Play with your virtual pet
- Change your perspective from ocean to green meadow, to snowy mountains

Alcove has something for everyone, no matter your age. Download Alcove and start exploring today!

Note: Alcove will keep growing with new immersive experiences and features. Please leave us a note to let us know what youâ€™d love to see next

changelog.change_log:
Version 1.107

NOTICE:
Alcove for Oculus Go support is ending.
We encourage users to upgrade to a newer platform such as the Quest, 
where Alcove continues to grow with new content and frequent updates.
More info may be found in the Help Menu.

Thank you for using Alcove for Oculus Go!

- Added ability to rotate photos
- Brain Games now have additional music
- Several fixes across all Brain Games
- Several fixes and performance improvements

Version 1.104
- Fixed downloads not working
- Several bug fixes and improvements

Version 1.99
- Fixed Jigsaw 360 not appearing in Interactives

Version 1.98

- Fixed incorrect height in several interactive experiences
- Added snow to Mountain environment
- Added several new videos to the music section!
- Chess - Fixed castling and en passant not working properly in multiplayer
- Checkers - Several performance improvements and bug fixes

Version 1.99
- Fixed Jigsaw 360 not appearing in Interactives

Version 1.98

- Fixed incorrect height in several interactive experiences
- Added snow to Mountain environment
- Added several new videos to the music section!
- Chess - Fixed castling and en passant not working properly in multiplayer
- Checkers - Several performance improvements and bug fixes

Version 1.93

- Chess has been added to Alcove!
- Minor bug fixes

Version 1.98

- Fixed incorrect height in several interactive experiences
- Added snow to Mountain environment
- Added several new videos to the music section!
- Chess - Fixed castling and en passant not working properly in multiplayer
- Checkers - Several performance improvements and bug fixes

Version 1.93

- Chess has been added to Alcove!
- Minor bug fixes

Version 1.93

- Chess has been added to Alcove!
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Version 1.87

- 5 Hours of New 3D Content from South America!
- Fixed a bug that could prevent photo assignments from sticking to the wall between sessions for some users
- Content browser no longer closes when releasing a click after dragging past the boundaries of the panel
- Travel globe no longer closes when releasing a click after dragging past the boundaries of the globe
- Clicks no longer occur on the travel globe when clearly intentionally rotating the globe
- BabbleRabbit's navigable space increased to include the carpet in front of the sofa
- Tour and tutorial panels now follow head movements in the same way as the primary menu

Version 1.87

- 5 Hours of New 3D Content from South America!
- The height of the games table has been adjusted to better accommodate seated users. We are working on further improvements for seated users.
- Fixed a bug that could prevent photo assignments from sticking to the wall between sessions for some users
- Content browser no longer closes when releasing a click after dragging past the boundaries of the panel
- Travel globe no longer closes when releasing a click after dragging past the boundaries of the globe
- Clicks no longer occur on the travel globe when clearly intentionally rotating the globe
- BabbleRabbit's navigable space increased to include the carpet in front of the sofa
- Tour and tutorial panels now follow head movements in the same way as the primary menu

Version 1.84
-Alcove has left beta, with a huge amount of bug fixes and major quality and performance improvements!
-Install size and load times have been significantly improved.
-You can now leave multiplayer sessions, and see currently connected players in the Alcove Quick Menu.
-You can now follow and lead players through the Alcove Quick Menu.
-Alcove now periodically checks for an internet connection.
-Further improvements to loft visuals and reflections.
-The tutorial has received some visual refreshes and clarity improvements.
-Further UI visual refreshes and updates.
-Media players now have a volume slider.

Version 1.72
-Hotfix for a few issues that popped up in the previous release.

Version 1.71
-The travel room holo-globe has received a major content update and design overhaul, explore the world with tons of new video content!
-Performance improvements
-Several UI improvements and fixes
-Minor Babble Rabbit fixes

Version 1.69
-Major UI visual refresh and updates
-New game - Blumber!
-New game demo - Jigsaw 360!
-Improved photo-management: when viewing a photo from the wall, you can now replace it with a photo from your library
-New globe in the travel room
-Several bug fixes and quality of life improvements

Version 1.72
-Hotfix for a few issues that popped up in the previous release.

-Performance improvements

-Improved photo-management: when viewing a photo from the wall, you can now replace it with a photo from your library

-Several bug fixes and quality of life improvements

Version 1.63
-New brain training game - Matching Pairs
-New brain training game - Rain Ripples
-New brain training game - Hide and Seek
-Fixed a bug that would prevent avatars from appearing correctly for some users in multiplayer
-Fixed a bug that would prevent invitation notifications from appearing in some of the brain training games

Version 1.71
-The travel room holo-globe has received a major content update and design overhaul, explore the world with tons of new video content!
-Performance improvements

Version 1.63
-New brain training game - Matching Pairs
-New brain training game - Rain Ripples
-New brain training game - Hide and Seek
-Fixed a bug that would prevent avatars from appearing correctly for some users in multiplayer
-Fixed a bug that would prevent invitation notifications from appearing in some of the brain training games

Version 1.61
-New brain training game - Speedsort
-Minor content-related bug fixes

Version 1.58
-New 10x10 brain training game!
-Major Babble Rabbit update
-New underwater video - Diving The Great Barrier Reef, Australia
-Further improvements to lighting
-Improved photo-sharing: When a user selects a photo from the wall, it will show the larger photo for other users in the photo area as well
-Fixed a follow-mode bug where the follower could get stuck after leaving a VR video

Version 1.63
-New brain training game - Matching Pairs
-New brain training game - Rain Ripples
-New brain training game - Hide and Seek
-Fixed a bug that would prevent avatars from appearing correctly for some users in multiplayer
-Fixed a bug that would prevent invitation notifications from appearing in some of the brain training games

Version 1.61
-New brain training game - Speedsort
-Minor content-related bug fixes

Version 1.58
-New 10x10 brain training game!
-Major Babble Rabbit update
-New underwater video - Diving The Great Barrier Reef, Australia
-Further improvements to lighting
-Improved photo-sharing: When a user selects a photo from the wall, it will show the larger photo for other users in the photo area as well
-Fixed a follow-mode bug where the follower could get stuck after leaving a VR video

Version 1.55
-Improved lighting throughout the home
-Adjusted font sizes in some panels to ensure that the complete experience name would be shown
-Fixed a bug in Quickblocks where a second restart would not work properly
-Fixed an issue where the unfollow pop-up would briefly be displayed when clicking unfollow
-Added beta disclaimer
-Improved audio timing in the tour
-Disabled 'multiplayer' option in Checkers when only one user is in the home
-Improved visibility of some objects

Version 1.52
-A new brain training game called QuickBlocks has been added to Alcove!
-Fixed an issue where a follower would be unable to unfollow while watching VR videos
-Fixed an issue where the second player of checkers would see reversed UI
-Fixed an issue where two players could follow each other and get stuck

Version 1.49
-Fixed an issue where playing a video could cause a crash for users who had uploaded their own images
-Fixed an issue where an invited user would not be able to see photos or videos from the user who invited them.
-You can now accept invitations from within the Memory Wall experience.
-Fixed a few bugs in the tour and tutorial
-Improved audio levels for multi-player voice
-Improved follow-mode video synchronization
-Improved performance

Version 1.39
-Bug fixes and UX improvements

Version 1.36
- New content including: compositions from the Sedlacek quartet, meditations, guided tours around Europe, and a road trip around the US
- You can now play checkers in the family room! Play single player against a computer or against a friend
- Introducing: Babble Rabbit! This pet bunny will follow you around the house, and you can interact with and talk to it
- Our first brain game: Memory Wall! Brought to you by the team over at Virtuleap, this game will challenge your cognitive thinking as you work through short term memory tasks
- Follow mode now allows you to lead another user around the home with you
- You can now upload your own home videos through the Rendever family portal and they will appear in the entertainment center
- Improved UI and UX polish throughout the house, including sound interactions

Version 1.61
-New SpeedSort brain training game!
-Minor content-related bug fixes

Version 1.58
-New 10x10 brain training game!
-Major Babble Rabbit update
